title: JSON Schema for animeApi base, support for v2 and v3

anisearch.title: AniSearch
anisearch.description: AniSearch ID, website: https://www.anisearch.com/, https://anisearch.de, https://anisearch.it, https://anisearch.es, https://anisearch.fr, https://anisearch.jp

annict.title: Annict
annict.description: Annict ID, website: https://annict.com/, https://en.annict.com/, https://annict.jp/

kaize_id.title: Kaize ID
kaize_id.description: Kaize ID in integer format, not recommended as some entry can't be found its ID compared to slug

kitsu.title: Kitsu
kitsu.description: Kitsu ID in integer, slug not suppported, website: https://kitsu.app/

nautiljon.title: Nautiljon
nautiljon.description: Nautiljon slug in plus, website: https://www.nautiljon.com/

nautiljon_id.title: Nautiljon ID
nautiljon_id.description: Nautiljon ID in integer format, used internally

shikimori.title: Shikimori/Шикимори
shikimori.description: Shikimori ID (nonprefixed), based on MyAnimeList ID. Remove prefix if found on the ID, website: https://shikimori.one/

themoviedb.title: The Movie Database (TMDB)
themoviedb.description: The Movie Database ID, website: https://www.themoviedb.org/

themoviedb_type.title: The Movie Database (TMDB) Type
themoviedb_type.description: The Movie Database type, either 'movies' or 'shows'

themoviedb_season.title: The Movie Database (TMDB) Season
themoviedb_season.description: The Movie Database season number, only used if themoviedb_type is 'shows', else null

trakt.title: Trakt
trakt.description: Trakt ID, slug not supported, website: https://trakt.tv/

trakt_season.title: Trakt Season
trakt_season.description: Trakt season number, only used if trakt_type is 'shows', else null

oneOf.$comment: Use this schema if you want to validate an array of anime
Use this schema if you want to validate an object known in each provider
